CustomField.description: GTMS-28592: Automatically identifies accounts eligible for FY26 tiered renewals by flagging contracts expiring in the next quarter. For accounts with a single non-trial contract, set to TRUE if the contract ends next quarter. For accounts with multiple co-termed contracts, set to TRUE if all contracts end in the same quarter AND that quarter is next quarter. For accounts with non co-termed contracts (ending in different quarters), always set to FALSE. Only applies to active/activated contracts with End Date within the next 365 days, excluding trial contracts. Used by Renewals Operations team to prioritize renewal activities.
CustomField.label: Tiered License Eligible
